verses.verse: אָדָ֥ם <S%H121><s%> Adam שֵׁ֖ת <S%H8352><s%> Sheth אֱנֽוֹשׁ׃ <S%H583><s%> Enosh
קֵינָ֥ן <S%H7018><s%> Kenan מַהֲלַלְאֵ֖ל <S%H4111><s%> Mahalaleel יָֽרֶד׃ <S%H3382><s%> Jered
חֲנ֥וֹךְ <S%H2585><s%> Henoch מְתוּשֶׁ֖לַח <S%H4968><s%> Methuselah לָֽמֶךְ׃ <S%H3929><s%> Lamech
נֹ֥חַ <S%H5146><s%> Noah שֵׁ֖ם <S%H8035><s%> Shem חָ֥ם <S%H2526><s%> Ham וָיָֽפֶת׃ <S%H3315><s%> and Japheth ס

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The sons יֶ֔פֶת <S%H3315><s%> of Japheth גֹּ֣מֶר <S%H1586><s%> Gomer וּמָג֔וֹג <S%H4031><s%> and Magog וּמָדַ֖י <S%H4074><s%> and Madai וְיָוָ֣ן <S%H3120><s%> and Javan וְתֻבָ֑ל <S%H8422><s%> and Tubal וּמֶ֖שֶׁךְ <S%H4902><s%> and Meshech וְתִירָֽס׃ <S%H8494><s%> and Tiras ס
וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons גֹּ֑מֶר <S%H1586><s%> of Gomer אַשְׁכֲּנַ֥ז <S%H813><s%> Ashchenaz וְדִיפַ֖ת <S%H7384><s%> and Riphath וְתוֹגַרְמָֽה׃ <S%H8425><s%> and Togarmah

וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons יָוָ֖ן <S%H3120><s%> of Javan אֱלִישָׁ֣ה <S%H473><s%> Elishah וְתַרְשִׁ֑ישָׁה <S%H8659><s%> and Tarshish כִּתִּ֖ים <S%H3794><s%> Kittim וְרוֹדָנִֽים׃ <S%H1721><s%> and Dodanim ס
בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> The sons חָ֑ם <S%H2526><s%> of Ham כּ֥וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> Cush וּמִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> and Mizraim פּ֥וּט <S%H6316><s%> Put וּכְנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> and Canaan

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons כ֔וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> of Cush סְבָא֙ <S%H5434><s%> Seba וַחֲוִילָ֔ה <S%H2341><s%> and Havilah וְסַבְתָּ֥א <S%H5454><s%> and Sabta וְרַעְמָ֖א <S%H7484><s%> and Raamah וְסַבְתְּכָ֑א <S%H5455><s%> and Sabtecha וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons רַעְמָ֖א <S%H7484><s%> of Raamah שְׁבָ֥א <S%H7614><s%> Sheba וּדְדָֽן׃ <S%H1719><s%> and Dedan ס

וְכ֖וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> And Cush יָלַ֣ד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִמְר֑וֹד <S%H5248><s%> Nimrod ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הֵחֵ֔ל <S%H2490><s%> he began לִהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> to be a גִּבּ֖וֹר <S%H1368><s%> to be mighty בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth ס

וּמִצְרַ֡יִם <S%H4714><s%> And Mizraim יָלַ֞ד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> [לוּדִיִּים כ] (לוּדִ֧ים <S%H3866><s%> Ludim ק) וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲנָמִ֛ים <S%H6047><s%> and Anamim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לְהָבִ֖ים <S%H3853><s%> and Lehabim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְתֻּחִֽים׃ <S%H5320><s%> and Naphtuhim

וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פַּתְרֻסִ֞ים <S%H6625><s%> And Pathrusim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כַּסְלֻחִ֗ים <S%H3695><s%> and Casluhim אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יָצְא֥וּ <S%H3318><s%> (of whom came מִשָּׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> in it פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כַּפְתֹּרִֽים׃ <S%H3732><s%> and Caphtor ס
וּכְנַ֗עַן <S%H3667><s%> And Canaan יָלַ֛ד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צִיד֥וֹן <S%H6721><s%> Zidon בְּכֹר֖וֹ <S%H1060><s%> his firstborn וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֵֽת׃ <S%H2845><s%> and Heth
וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיְבוּסִי֙ <S%H2983><s%> The Jebusite וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣אֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> also and the Amorite וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> הַגִּרְגָּשִֽׁי׃ <S%H1622><s%> and the Girgashite
וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחִוִּ֥י <S%H2340><s%> And the Hivite וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽעַרְקִ֖י <S%H6208><s%> and the Arkite וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַסִּינִֽי׃ <S%H5513><s%> and the Sinite
וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאַרְוָדִ֥י <S%H721><s%> And the Arvadite וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצְּמָרִ֖י <S%H6786><s%> and the Zemarite וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽחֲמָתִֽי׃ <S%H2577><s%> and the Hamathite ס

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The sons שֵׁ֔ם <S%H8035><s%> of Shem עֵילָ֣ם <S%H5867><s%> Elam וְאַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> and Asshur וְאַרְפַּכְשַׁ֖ד <S%H775><s%> and Arphaxad וְל֣וּד <S%H3865><s%> and Lud וַאֲרָ֑ם <S%H758><s%> and Aram וְע֥וּץ <S%H5780><s%> and Uz וְח֖וּל <S%H2343><s%> and Hul וְגֶ֥תֶר <S%H1666><s%> and Gether וָמֶֽשֶׁךְ׃ <S%H4902><s%> and Meshech ס

וְאַרְפַּכְשַׁ֖ד <S%H775><s%> And Arphaxad יָלַ֣ד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׁ֑לַח <S%H7974><s%> Shelah וְשֶׁ֖לַח <S%H7974><s%> and Shelah יָלַ֥ד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵֽבֶר׃ <S%H5677><s%> Eber

וּלְעֵ֥בֶר <S%H5677><s%> And unto Eber יֻלַּ֖ד <S%H3205><s%> were born שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> two בָנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> sons שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> the name הָאֶחָ֞ד <S%H259><s%> of the one פֶּ֗לֶג <S%H6389><s%> [was] Peleg כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> in בְיָמָיו֙ <S%H3117><s%> because in his days נִפְלְגָ֣ה <S%H6385><s%> was divided הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> name אָחִ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brother's יָקְטָֽן׃ <S%H3355><s%> [was] Joktan

וְיָקְטָ֣ן <S%H3355><s%> And Joktan יָלַ֔ד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַלְמוֹדָ֖ד <S%H486><s%> Almodad וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׁ֑לֶף <S%H8026><s%> and Sheleph וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲצַרְמָ֖וֶת <S%H2700><s%> and Hazarmaveth וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָֽרַח׃ <S%H3392><s%> and Jerah
וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֲדוֹרָ֥ם <S%H1913><s%> Hadoram וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אוּזָ֖ל <S%H187><s%> also and Uzal וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּקְלָֽה׃ <S%H1853><s%> and Diklah
וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵיבָ֥ל <S%H5858><s%> And Ebal וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבִימָאֵ֖ל <S%H39><s%> and Abimael וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁבָֽא׃ <S%H7614><s%> and Sheba

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אוֹפִ֥יר <S%H211><s%> And Ophir וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲוִילָ֖ה <S%H2341><s%> and Havilah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹבָ֑ב <S%H3103><s%> and Jobab כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> All these [were] the sons יָקְטָֽן׃ <S%H3355><s%> of Joktan ס
שֵׁ֥ם ׀ <S%H8035><s%> Shem אַרְפַּכְשַׁ֖ד <S%H775><s%> Arphaxad שָֽׁלַח׃ <S%H7974><s%> Shelah
עֵ֥בֶר <S%H5677><s%> Eber פֶּ֖לֶג <S%H6389><s%> Peleg רְעֽוּ׃ <S%H7466><s%> Reu
שְׂר֥וּג <S%H8286><s%> Serug נָח֖וֹר <S%H5152><s%> Nahor תָּֽרַח׃ <S%H8646><s%> Terah
אַבְרָ֖ם <S%H87><s%> Abram ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> that אַבְרָהָֽם׃ <S%H85><s%> the same [is] Abraham ס
בְּנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> The sons אַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> of Abraham יִצְחָ֖ק <S%H3327><s%> Isaac וְיִשְׁמָעֵֽאל׃ <S%H3458><s%> and Ishmael ס

אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These תֹּלְדוֹתָ֑ם <S%H8435><s%> These [are] their generations בְּכ֤וֹר <S%H1060><s%> The firstborn יִשְׁמָעֵאל֙ <S%H3458><s%> of Ishmael נְבָי֔וֹת <S%H5032><s%> Nebaioth וְקֵדָ֥ר <S%H6938><s%> then Kedar וְאַדְבְּאֵ֖ל <S%H110><s%> and Adbeel וּמִבְשָֽׂם׃ <S%H4017><s%> and Mibsam
מִשְׁמָ֣ע <S%H4927><s%> Mishma וְדוּמָ֔ה <S%H1746><s%> and Dumah מַשָּׂ֖א <S%H4854><s%> Massa חֲדַ֥ד <S%H2301><s%> Hadad וְתֵימָֽא׃ <S%H8485><s%> and Tema

יְט֥וּר <S%H3195><s%> Jetur נָפִ֖ישׁ <S%H5305><s%> Naphish וָקֵ֑דְמָה <S%H6929><s%> and Kedemah אֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> These are the sons יִשְׁמָעֵֽאל׃ <S%H3458><s%> of Ishmael ס

וּבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> Now the sons קְטוּרָ֜ה <S%H6989><s%> of Keturah פִּילֶ֣גֶשׁ <S%H6370><s%> concubine אַבְרָהָ֗ם <S%H85><s%> Abraham's יָלְדָ֞ה <S%H3205><s%> she bare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זִמְרָ֧ן <S%H2175><s%> Zimran וְיָקְשָׁ֛ן <S%H3370><s%> and Jokshan וּמְדָ֥ן <S%H4091><s%> and Medan וּמִדְיָ֖ן <S%H4080><s%> and Midian וְיִשְׁבָּ֣ק <S%H3435><s%> and Ishbak וְשׁ֑וּחַ <S%H7744><s%> and Shuah וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons יָקְשָׁ֖ן <S%H3370><s%> of Jokshan שְׁבָ֥א <S%H7614><s%> Sheba וּדְדָֽן׃ <S%H1719><s%> and Dedan ס

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons מִדְיָ֗ן <S%H4080><s%> of Midian עֵיפָ֤ה <S%H5891><s%> Ephah וָעֵ֙פֶר֙ <S%H6081><s%> and Epher וַחֲנ֔וֹךְ <S%H2585><s%> and Henoch וַאֲבִידָ֖ע <S%H28><s%> and Abida וְאֶלְדָּעָ֑ה <S%H420><s%> and Eldaah כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> All these [are] the sons קְטוּרָֽה׃ <S%H6989><s%> of Keturah ס

וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> begat אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> And Abraham אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִצְחָ֑ק <S%H3327><s%> Isaac ס בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The sons יִצְחָ֔ק <S%H3327><s%> of Isaac עֵשָׂ֖ו <S%H6215><s%> Esau וְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> and Israel ס

בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> The sons עֵשָׂ֑ו <S%H6215><s%> of Esau אֱלִיפַ֛ז <S%H464><s%> Eliphaz רְעוּאֵ֥ל <S%H7467><s%> Reuel וִיע֖וּשׁ <S%H3266><s%> and Jeush וְיַעְלָ֥ם <S%H3281><s%> and Jaalam וְקֹֽרַח׃ <S%H7141><s%> and Korah ס

בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> The sons אֱלִיפָ֑ז <S%H464><s%> of Eliphaz תֵּימָ֤ן <S%H8487><s%> Teman וְאוֹמָר֙ <S%H201><s%> and Omar צְפִ֣י <S%H6825><s%> Zephi וְגַעְתָּ֔ם <S%H1609><s%> and Gatam קְנַ֖ז <S%H7073><s%> Kenaz וְתִמְנָ֥ע <S%H8555><s%> and Timna וַעֲמָלֵֽק׃ <S%H6002><s%> and Amalek ס
בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> The sons רְעוּאֵ֑ל <S%H7467><s%> of Reuel נַ֥חַת <S%H5184><s%> Nahath זֶ֖רַח <S%H2226><s%> Zerah שַׁמָּ֥ה <S%H8048><s%> Shammah וּמִזָּֽה׃ <S%H4199><s%> and Mizzah ס

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons שֵׂעִ֔יר <S%H8165><s%> of Seir לוֹטָ֥ן <S%H3877><s%> Lotan וְשׁוֹבָ֖ל <S%H7732><s%> and Shobal וְצִבְע֣וֹן <S%H6649><s%> and Zibeon וַֽעֲנָ֑ה <S%H6034><s%> and Anah וְדִישֹׁ֥ן <S%H1787><s%> and Dishon וְאֵ֖צֶר <S%H687><s%> and Ezer וְדִישָֽׁן׃ <S%H1789><s%> and Dishan

וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons לוֹטָ֖ן <S%H3877><s%> of Lotan חֹרִ֣י <S%H2753><s%> Hori וְהוֹמָ֑ם <S%H1950><s%> and Homam וַאֲח֥וֹת <S%H269><s%> sister לוֹטָ֖ן <S%H3877><s%> [was] Lotan's תִּמְנָֽע׃ <S%H8555><s%> and Timna ס

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The sons שׁוֹבָ֔ל <S%H7732><s%> of Shobal עַלְיָ֧ן <S%H5935><s%> Alian וּמָנַ֛חַת <S%H4506><s%> and Manahath וְעֵיבָ֖ל <S%H5858><s%> and Ebal שְׁפִ֣י <S%H8195><s%> Shephi וְאוֹנָ֑ם <S%H208><s%> and Onam ס וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons צִבְע֖וֹן <S%H6649><s%> of Zibeon אַיָּ֥ה <S%H345><s%> Aiah וַעֲנָֽה׃ <S%H6034><s%> and Anah

בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> The sons עֲנָ֖ה <S%H6034><s%> of Anah דִּישׁ֑וֹן <S%H1787><s%> Dishon ס וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons דִישׁ֔וֹן <S%H1787><s%> of Dishon חַמְרָ֥ן <S%H2566><s%> Amram וְאֶשְׁבָּ֖ן <S%H790><s%> and Eshban וְיִתְרָ֥ן <S%H3506><s%> and Ithran וּכְרָֽן׃ <S%H3763><s%> and Cheran ס

בְּֽנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> The sons אֵ֔צֶר <S%H687><s%> of Ezer בִּלְהָ֥ן <S%H1092><s%> Bilhan וְזַעֲוָ֖ן <S%H2190><s%> and Zavan יַעֲקָ֑ן <S%H3292><s%> [and] Jakan בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> The sons דִישׁ֖וֹן <S%H1787><s%> Dishon ע֥וּץ <S%H5780><s%> Uz וַאֲרָֽן׃ <S%H765><s%> and Aran פ
